Trade/Device Name(s): Spectral West Nile Virus IgM STATusTM Test
Analyte(s): IgM antibodies to West Nile Virus
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Spectral West Nile Virus IgM STATusTM rapid immunochromatographic test for qualitative detection of IgM antibodies to West Nile Virus in serum or plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: For presumptive laboratory diagnosis of West Nile virus infection in patients with signs and symptoms of meningoencephalitis, detecting IgM antibodies to WNV in human serum or plasma; not for point of care, home use, or donor screening.
